mapper.select:
select a.*, b.account from system_log a left join user_account b on a.user_account_id = b.user_account_id
and a.log_type = #{logType}
and a.ip like concat('%',#{ip},'%')
and a.describe like concat('%',#{describe},'%')
and date_format(a.add_time,'%Y-%m-%d') >= date_format(#{startDate},'%Y-%m-%d')
and date_format(a.add_time,'%Y-%m-%d') <= date_format(#{endDate},'%Y-%m-%d')
and b.account like concat('%',#{account},'%')
order by a.add_time desc
